name: Endless Space (itch) (FlamingSparrow)
description:
Please Play in Fullscreen!

This game was created in one hour for the Rigid Jam! ASSETS INCLUDED. (Spent way too much time on those lmao)

You are an unnamed hero on an unnamed spaceship who needs to avoid the purple voidlings for as long as he can so that he can make home (even though he never does). 

Controls:

W - Move Up

S - Move Down

Try to last the longest and get the highest score!
